unittitle_ssm: Elizabeth Feldhusen collection of Brooklyn ephemera
abstract_ssm: The collection contains ephemera related to Brooklyn, New York, dating from the 1920s to 1992. The collection is especially focused on civic matters of the 1970s and 1980s.
